content: I know alot of us might have experienced this issue although there are al ot of causes actually ¬†but I'm just here to talk about the main cause ¬†which ¬†probably happens most times when you experience a delayed Btc transaction. ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Block size: Block in btc¬† contains sets of transctions made by users , this transactions ¬†depends ¬†on each others so don't even think about cheating ¬†it won't ¬†work ¬†lol. comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: A mined block contains mining reward and transactionsUnconfirmed transaction are in the mempoolDelayed or stuck transaction is because of the low fee used for itDelayed transaction also can be caused by mempool congestionUse a wallet that support replace-by-fee like Electrum, Sparrow, Bluewallet et cetera. With RBF enabled, you will be able to pump the transaction fee to increase the chance of miners to include your transaction in the mempool into their candidate block.For fee estimation, these two mempool sites are recommended:https://mempool.space/https://jochen-hoenicke.de/queue/#BTC,24h,weight for more accuracy. For lower transaction, use segwit addresses and always consolidate your high input.Quote from: promise444c5 on October 20, 2023, 10:40:42 PMBlock in btc¬† contains sets of transctions made by users , Mined blocks contain the mining reward which is presently 6.25 BTC. They also contain the transaction the miner included which become the confirmed transaction. The miner takes the mining reward and the transaction fees as the incentive.Quote from: promise444c5 on October 20, 2023, 10:40:42 PMNow let's go back to our delayed transactions. In relation to Block size, pending transactions might has filled up a block therefore, causing¬† delay in your pending transaction for some time befor it get solved on the block.Pending transaction can not fill up a block. Pending transaction are in the mempool. Mined block contains the transaction a miner included into his candidate block that later become the mined block.

comments.body: One tin wey I fit tok about this matta of delay transaction relating to personal experience at different intervals be say nah low transaction fees the cos am. When you wan make transaction and the fee low e go take much longer period for the transaction to complete bases on how other transactions wey people son make also dey for queue the wait before your own com in so each transaction the stay for line based on the rate of the transaction fees e com wit.The previous times I don encounter the experience I just had to bump the transaction again or double spend (mk u know say e go cost you more fees ) so that my transaction go get quick confirmation bcos miners the give priority first to those transaction with higher fees for inside the blocks.Techniques to reduce transaction fees (Bitcoin Wiki)  All about "stuck" transactions and what you can do to fix them

comments.body: This was experienced earlier this year when Mempool was congested because of the Ordinal NFTs, those using wallet like trustwallet suffered for high transaction fee and when affected by delayed transaction they have nothing to do than to wait while those using wallet like electrum, bluewallet and other wallet having the RBF features, could bribe their ways for their transaction to be validated early by just increasing the transaction fee.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on October 21, 2023, 05:17:28 AMOne tin wey I fit tok about this matta of delay transaction relating to personal experience at different intervals be say nah low transaction fees the cos am. When you wan make transaction and the fee low e go take much longer period for the transaction to complete bases on how other transactions wey people son make also dey for queue the wait before your own com in so each transaction the stay for line based on the rate of the transaction fees e com wit.Yes, low transaction fee can be part of it, but the main reason is mempool congestion. I checked the mempool last week and I saw the mempool getting decongested down to 2 sat/vbyte and I make 2 sat/vbyte transaction and it took less than 30 minutes to 1 hour to confirm. If the mempool is not congested, low fee transactions can be confirmed.

You are very correct Charles.I had an 48 hour delay once. It was my first time I had experienced that using Electrum wallet. Usually I don't check the fee and it's corresponding priority fee on memepool.space. But when this happened, I reached out to one of our guys here. I did and within 30mins I got my Bitcoin on my exchange wallet.
